languages.text: "Это было безответственно с твоей стороны. Если бы тебя убили там, на планете, никто бы не узнал о ней, и святыня была бы утрачена".
"That was irresponsible of you. If you had gotten yourself killed on the planet, no one would have learned about its existence, and the holy relic would have been lost."
languages.original_text: "Это было безответственно с твоей стороны. Если бы тебя убили там, на планете, никто бы не узнал о ней, и святыня была бы утрачена".

traits.locale_text: "That was rather irresponsible of you. If you had gotten yourself killed on the planet, no one would have learned about its existence, and the holy relic would have been lost."
"That was rather irresponsible of you. If you had gotten yourself killed on the planet, no one would have learned about its existence, and the holy relic would have been lost."
"That was irresponsible of you. If you had gotten yourself killed on the planet, no one would have learned about its existence, and the holy relic would have been lost."
"That was irresponsible of you. If you had gotten yourself killed on the planet, no one would have learned about its existence, and the holy relic would have been lost."
"That was irresponsible of you. If you had gotten yourself killed on the planet, no one would have learned about its existence, and the holy relic would have been lost."

languages.text: “你的行为很不负责。如果你当时死在了那颗行星上，就不会再有其他人知道它的存在，圣物也会因此遗失。”
languages.original_text: "That was irresponsible of you. If you had gotten yourself killed on the planet, no one would have learned about its existence, and the holy relic would have been lost."

traits.locale_text: “你的行为很不负责。如果你当时死在了那颗行星上，就不会再有其他人知道它的存在，圣物也会因此遗失。”

languages.text: «Fue una irresponsabilidad. Si hubiera muerto en ese planeta, nadie sabría de su existencia y la reliquia sagrada se habría perdido».
languages.original_text: "That was irresponsible of you. If you had gotten yourself killed on the planet, no one would have learned about its existence, and the holy relic would have been lost."

traits.locale_text: «Fue una irresponsabilidad. Si hubiera muerto en ese planeta, nadie sabría de su existencia y la reliquia sagrada se habría perdido».

languages.text: 「お前は無責任だった。もしお前があの惑星で命を落としていたら、誰もその存在を知ることはなかっただろうし、聖遺物も失われていただろう」
languages.original_text: "That was irresponsible of you. If you had gotten yourself killed on the planet, no one would have learned about its existence, and the holy relic would have been lost."

traits.locale_text: 「お前は無責任だった。もしお前があの惑星で命を落としていたら、誰もその存在を知ることはなかっただろうし、聖遺物も失われていただろう」

languages.text: "Das war unverantwortlich von Euch. Wärt Ihr auf dem Planeten gestorben, hätte niemand von seiner Existenz erfahren, und das heilige Relikt wäre verloren gewesen."
languages.original_text: "That was irresponsible of you. If you had gotten yourself killed on the planet, no one would have learned about its existence, and the holy relic would have been lost."

traits.locale_text: "Das war unverantwortlich von Euch. Wärt Ihr auf dem Planeten gestorben, hätte niemand von seiner Existenz erfahren, und das heilige Relikt wäre verloren gewesen."

languages.text: « Vous avez agi de manière irresponsable. Si vous aviez trouvé la mort sur cette planète, personne n'aurait découvert son existence et la relique sacrée serait restée perdue. »
languages.original_text: "That was irresponsible of you. If you had gotten yourself killed on the planet, no one would have learned about its existence, and the holy relic would have been lost."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez agi de manière irresponsable. Si vous aviez trouvé la mort sur cette planète, personne n'aurait découvert son existence et la relique sacrée serait restée perdue. »

languages.text: "Sorumsuzca hareket etmişsin. O gezegende katledilseydin kutsal yadigârın varlığından kimsenin haberi olmayacaktı; yadigâr, sonsuza dek yitip gidecekti."
languages.original_text: "That was irresponsible of you. If you had gotten yourself killed on the planet, no one would have learned about its existence, and the holy relic would have been lost."

traits.locale_text: "Sorumsuzca hareket etmişsin. O gezegende katledilseydin kutsal yadigârın varlığından kimsenin haberi olmayacaktı ve yadigâr, sonsuza dek yitip gidecekti."
